SEARCH
Package com.smsapp.services.implementations

Class TeacherImpl

java.lang.Object
com.smsapp.services.implementations.TeacherImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITeacher
public class TeacherImpl extends Object implements ITeacher
Implementation of the ITeacher interface for managing teacher records in a school management system. This class provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on teacher data, as well as additional functionalities such as assigning students to teachers.

The class interacts with the database through JDBC, using SQL queries defined in the Queries class. It handles operations involving the `Teacher` and `Address` entities, and supports transactions to ensure data consistency.

Key methods include:

  • addTeacher(Teacher): Adds a new teacher to the database.
  • getTeacherById(int): Retrieves a teacher's details by their ID, including associated students.
  • getAllTeachers(): Retrieves a list of all teachers in the database, including their assigned students.
  • updateTeacher(Teacher): Updates the details of an existing teacher.
  • deleteTeacher(int): Deletes a teacher from the database by their ID.
  • assignStudentsToTeacher(int, List): Assigns a list of students to a teacher.

The implementation ensures proper handling of database resources and transactions, committing changes where necessary and rolling back in case of errors. It also includes exception handling to manage potential issues with database operations.

Author:
MonigaBalasubramanian

  • Method Details

    • addTeacher

      public void addTeacher(Teacher teacher)
      Adds a new teacher to the database.

      This method performs the following operations:

      • Inserts the teacher's address into the database and retrieves the generated address ID.
      • Inserts the teacher's details into the `teacher` table using the retrieved address ID.

      Specified by:
      addTeacher in interface ITeacher
      Parameters:
      teacher - The Teacher object containing the details of the teacher to be added.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the insertion process.

    • getTeacherById

      public Teacher getTeacherById(int teacherId) throws TeacherNotFoundException
      Retrieves a teacher by their ID.

      This method fetches the details of a teacher from the database using the specified teacher ID. It also retrieves the list of students assigned to the teacher.

      Specified by:
      getTeacherById in interface ITeacher
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Teacher object with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - If no teacher with the specified ID is found in the database.
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the retrieval process.

    • getAllTeachers

      public List<Teacher> getAllTeachers()
      Retrieves a list of all teachers.

      This method fetches all teacher records from the database, including their assigned students.

      Specified by:
      getAllTeachers in interface ITeacher
      Returns:
      A List of Teacher objects representing all teachers in the database.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the retrieval process.

    • updateTeacher

      public void updateTeacher(Teacher teacher) throws TeacherNotFoundException
      Updates the details of an existing teacher.

      This method updates the teacher's information in the database, including their address.

      Specified by:
      updateTeacher in interface ITeacher
      Parameters:
      teacher - The Teacher object containing the updated details of the teacher.
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - If the teacher with the specified ID is not found in the database.
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the update process.

    • deleteTeacher

      public void deleteTeacher(int teacherId) throws TeacherNotFoundException
      Deletes a teacher from the database by their ID.

      This method removes the teacher record from the database. It first verifies that the teacher exists before performing the deletion.

      Specified by:
      deleteTeacher in interface ITeacher
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher to be deleted.
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - If the teacher with the specified ID is not found in the database.
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the deletion process.

    • assignStudentsToTeacher

      public void assignStudentsToTeacher(int teacherId, List<Integer> studentIds)
      Assigns a list of students to a teacher.

      This method adds entries to the `student_teacher` junction table to associate the specified students with the teacher.

      Specified by:
      assignStudentsToTeacher in interface ITeacher
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher to whom students are to be assigned.
      studentIds - The List of student IDs to be assigned to the teacher.
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - If the teacher with the specified ID is not found in the database.
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the assignment process.
